channel.title: Particles on clayto
channel.description: Recent content in Particles on clayto

item.title: Fireflies
item.description: Fireflies is a WebGL demo in which a friendly flock of fireflies forms shapes for your entertainment. Here are some live demo links, and a video. Watch the original Watch the geekSPARK edition Thanks to Loren Schmidt for agreeing to let me use the awesome pixel-person avatar. View source, if you’re into that kind of thing.
